label: 香山
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Mountain north of the Himalayas where the kinnaras, horse-headed musicians in Indra's service, lived.  The mountain is identified with the Mount Kailāsa in Tibet, just north of the Nepalese border (p. 557n).
